ReviewList.Text: problems are challenging. theory and some applications are covered in depth. but that's all useless if, from time to time, variables are left unexplained. i need a textbook to make the material easier to learn. if i just want a book that's good for interesting problem sets, i'll get a 30$ study manual.
Make sure you're getting the product you need if you're taking both physics classes as this only covers the 2nd semester at most universities.

The physics vol. 2 continue farther about more physics concept, especially focus on electrical field. The books explain clearly how concept is been applied and shows example how it related to our daily life in physics. It is great book to start at freshman college level and great book to keep for future reference.
This book was exactly as described and was delivered on time!
The book was very dirty, but delivery was fast!

This textbook definitely makes physics easier to learn. If you think otherwise, open up a book from twenty years ago and then try to complain. The layout of the chapters is a great way to split up all the details of learning something as relatively complex to grasp as physics. There's lots of colors, images, examples, real world applications, and conceptual questions to help you learn the material in the most mind-friendly environment. I am extremely thankful that I am learning the mathematical and problem-solving aspects of physics in 2012/2013 than in the 80's or 90's. Some of the questions at the end of each chapter can be quite challenging, but mastering those makes mastering the tests an easy feat to accomplish.
Great seller, great shipping, was exactly what i needed and the description was right on. Just what i needed. Didn't really enjoy the book since I don't care for physics tho.
It was not clear that it was Volume 2!!! The covers of Vol. 1 & 2 are the same! :(
Seller stated used good condition, but the book that I received was so old, dirty and wrinkle.  I feel cheated and very unhappy (Paid $40.00 for it).
